DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy of a customized sound therapy in reducing tinnitus loudness and increasing the residual inhibition.
DOC.brief_title: Customized Acoustic Stimulation for the Treatment of Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Male or female Tinnitus present for 6 months or more Adequate command of English Active illicit drug use, alcohol dependence Treatable cause of tinnitus History of psychosis Subjects on medications known to cause tinnitus (aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen) which could not be stopped will be excluded.
